CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve with real-time alerts
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it. Hear from developers who use our platform.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: EtherScan's real-time transaction tracking has been a game-changer for our dApp's user experience. With instant notifications, our users never miss a beat.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The ETHPlorer API gave us reliable access to enriched Ethereum data, allowing us to build powerful Layer 2 analytics tools.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: EtherScan's simple API was instrumental in helping us track and verify transactions for our DeFi lending platform.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay updated with the latest Ethereum transactions as they happen. Our app constantly scans the network to detect new transfers and contract interactions.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get in-depth insights into each transaction, including the sender, recipient, value transferred, gas fees, and any associated data or events triggered.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Tailor the app to your specific needs. Set up filters to only track transactions relevant to your interests, and receive instant alerts for important events.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Navigate through a clean and intuitive interface designed for seamless transaction exploration. Quickly find the information you need with powerful search and sorting capabilities.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Securely connect your Ethereum wallet to the app for personalized transaction monitoring and seamless tracking of your assets and activities.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Leverage our robust API to integrate real-time Ethereum transaction data into your own applications and workflows, enabling endless possibilities for automation and analysis.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Ethereum Transaction Tracker
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is the Ethereum Transaction Tracker?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: The Ethereum Transaction Tracker is an app that allows you to monitor the Ethereum blockchain for new transactions in real-time. It provides a convenient way to stay up-to-date with the latest activity on the network.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The app connects directly to Ethereum nodes and listens for new transactions as they are broadcasted to the network. When a new transaction is detected, the app notifies you with details about the transaction, such as the sender, recipient, value transferred, and more.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I filter the transactions I want to track?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, the app allows you to set filters to only receive notifications for transactions that meet certain criteria. You can filter by address, value range, contract interactions, and other parameters to tailor the app to your specific needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app suitable for personal or business use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: The Ethereum Transaction Tracker is designed to be useful for both personal and business purposes. Individuals can use it to monitor their own transactions, while businesses can leverage it to track payments, monitor smart contract interactions, and stay informed about activity relevant to their operations.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our Ethereum transaction monitoring tool
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to monitor the Ethereum blockchain in real-time and get notified of new transactions as they occur. Perfect for tracking payments, token transfers, smart contract deployments and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We connect directly to Ethereum nodes to stream new block and transaction data as it gets mined. You can set filters to only see transactions you care about based on addresses, contracts, token types etc.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What kind of notifications do you offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can receive notifications via email, web hooks or our mobile app instantly when transactions matching your filters occur. Notifications include all relevant transaction details.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, all monitored transaction data can be exported in CSV or JSON formats for further analysis in spreadsheets or custom software applications.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, we offer a comprehensive API to stream transaction data, manage filters programmatically, and retrieve historical data for transactions you may have missed.
